resources.string: At Shoe Store, you can customize and add any new shoes to your collection. You have the freedom to personalize the name, size, brand, description, and image of each shoe. Additionally, you can explore and check the list of previously stored shoes. \n\nWelcome to the ultimate and unparalleled shoe shopping experience!
Steps to add a new shoe

1. Click on the add floating action button icon on the shoe list screen. 
2. Add shoe details like name, size, brand, description and image path. 
3. Ensure all values are of type String except for the size. 
4. There are 10 images available for shoes. To use them, enter the shoe name following the pattern shoe1,shoe2,shoe3 â€¦, shoe10. If an invalid image name is entered, the default image will be shown. 
5. To add more than one image, separate them by comma. For example, "shoe1, shoe2", etc.
